name: Oedipus-(n+1)
description:
Interactive fiction game based on the short film "Oedipe-(n+1)" by Jean-Jacques Nguyen and Eric Rognard. Created by Jess Skyleson using Twine.

Image Credits

All images used, except those named below, are screen shots taken from the short film “Oedipe-(n+1)”. This film was obtained via a purchased DVD copy of the anthology “Boy Crush”, distributed by Wolfe Video LLC. 

Sleep.jpg was created by the game developer.

All other non-film images used are screen shots from the below websites, last accessed 11/29/2021:

Waking.jpg:  https://videohive.net/item/silhouette-of-person-walking-in-tunnel-to-the-bright-...

Light.jpg:  https://www.shutterstock.com/video/clip-7769476-surgical-lamps-operating-room

Watch.jpg:  https://www.trendhunter.com/trends/tokyoflash-aeon-lcd-watch

Phone.jpg:  https://www.techradar.com/news/what-could-your-future-smartphone-look-like-in-20...
